#summary Mark a user account as offline (if it is not already).
#labels Protocol-User

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||RemoveSession||String||Yes||
||`UserID`||UUID of the user to remove all sessions for||UUID||Optional||
||`SessionID`||Session identifier to remove||UUID||Optional^1^||

  * ^1^Either UserID or SessionID must be specified

{{{
RequestMethod=RemoveSession
&UserID=efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if the requested session or all sessions for the requested user were removed, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":"true",
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":"false",
    "Message":"An unknown error occurred"
}
}}}
